name: Black Diamond Hotforge Quickdraw
description: The HotForge draw has a straight and a bent-gate HotForge carabiner threaded on a polyester dogbone. This is a great design in a multi-purpose draw with smooth-clipping keylock nose action.Corrosion resistant anodized aluminum.Carabiners have a deep basket with a flattened bottom so ropes and webbing stays put.Equipped with an 18mm Polyester Dogbone with Straitjacket keeper.
